premium.documentsDesc: Download pre-filled forms for vet and municipality.

premium.adoptionHistoryDesc: Complete documentation export for vet change or relocation.

about.heroTitle: An ecosystem, not a classifieds board
about.heroDesc: City Cat is the first operating system for Italian feline adoption. Every role has dedicated tools. Every flow is structured. No WhatsApp, no Excel.
about.catProfileDesc: The structured behavioral profile feeds the Matching Wizard. Filled in by the shelter using standardized scales ‚Äî no free text.
about.matchingTitle: Matching Wizard ‚Äî find the right cat for you
about.matchingDesc: 6 lifestyle questions. The system calculates a compatibility score for each cat and shows the reasons. Answers are completely anonymous: the shelter never sees them.
about.matchingRule1: Budget <‚Ç¨30/month ‚Üí priority to senior cats already sterilized
about.matchingRule2: Pregnancy ‚Üí only cats with negative toxoplasmosis
about.matchingBadge: Free: top 3 ¬∑ Premium: full list + alerts
about.matchingQuestion: How much can you spend per month?
about.matchingHint: There's no right answer ‚Äî it helps us find a sustainable cat for you
about.matchingR1: Used to being alone up to 8 hours
about.heartDesc: A special category for senior cats, FIV+, traumatized or long-waiters. The badge activates automatically with 2+ triggers: in shelter >60 days, age >8 years, FIV/FeLV+, 3+ failed adoptions.
about.heartDesc2: Every month City Cat promotes a "Heart Adoption of the Month". The adopter receives the permanent "Heart Adopter" badge.
about.heartStoryText: He had been in the shelter for 3 years when our volunteer Marco met him‚Ä¶
about.heartPatienceText: Romeo needs time to trust. The first days he'll hide‚Ä¶
about.heartVictoriesText: When he arrived he wouldn't let anyone touch him. Now he accepts cuddles in the evening‚Ä¶
about.routineDesc: Not a checklist. Each step has an owner, a deadline, and unlocks only when the previous one is completed and verified. Goodbye WhatsApp coordination.
about.rl_assignedTo: Assigned to: Volunteer Sara M. ¬∑ Documents: vet report
about.taskDesc: Each task comes with linked cat, deadline and colored urgency. Swipe left to complete (photo required). Swipe right to postpone. Expired without completion ‚Üí automatic notification to shelter.
about.candidatureDesc: Before approving, the shelter sees the adopter's history: completed adoptions, zero reports, verified profile. Not instinct ‚Äî data.
about.candidatureDesc2: The score is visible only to the shelter. The adopter only sees the "Verified Adopter" badge.
about.cs_missingDesc: Report a missing cat with photo, map pin and notification radius. Push alerts to nearby volunteers.
about.cs_proDesc: Search vets and cat sitters, book with inline calendar, pay in escrow.
about.cs_healthDesc: Vaccinations, medications, visits with reminders. Cat wallet with OCR receipts.
about.cs_marketDesc: Handmade cat products with contextual visibility in the adopter's wallet.
about.cs_dashDesc: Multi-layer map, anonymized aggregate reports, API integration.
about.cs_matchingDesc: Real-time score, predictive alerts, health record integration.
about.pricingSnapAdopterDesc: Complete matching and unlimited health records
about.pricingSnapShelterDesc: Unlimited cat management and configurable RoutineLine
about.pricingSnapProDesc: Integrated agenda, digital contracts and Escrow payments
about.ctaTitle: Join the Beta. Today's price is yours forever.
about.ctaNote: No credit card required to apply
about.featureHealthDesc: The health record is the permanent digital registry for your cat. Vaccinations with dates and automatic reminders. Medication schedules with daily alerts. PDF attachments of reports and analyses ‚Äî complete downloadable history. The cat wallet with OCR scanned receipts automatically categorizes expenses and generates monthly PDF reports.
about.vetDesc: Book the vet in-app, pay in escrow. Health record updated by the vet with digital signature. Supplies warehouse with automatic reorder alerts. Integrated video calls for remote consultations.
about.behDesc: Integrated video call with session recording. Structured session notes + follow-up tasks assignable to the owner. Therapeutic path timeline for each patient.
about.sitterDesc: Automatic digital contract generated with each booking. Mandatory daily updates: photo + text by 8pm. Escrow payment with automatic release 48h after end-of-stay confirmation. City Cat basic liability coverage on every booking.

pricing.heroTitle: Pricing designed for those who make a difference
pricing.heroDesc: Join during the Beta and lock your price forever. Not a limited-time offer ‚Äî a permanent recognition.
pricing.heroBadge: Beta prices locked ‚Äî valid as long as you keep your subscription
pricing.adopterPremiumSub: = ‚Ç¨2.42/month ¬∑ then ‚Ç¨79/year after beta ¬∑ you stay at ‚Ç¨29 forever
pricing.adopterPremiumFeat1: Unlimited Matching Wizard + new match alerts
pricing.fosterFeat3: Loyalty points convertible to marketplace discounts
pricing.b2gNote: Annual flat pricing ‚Äî suited for PA budget cycles. All data is aggregated and anonymized. No individual data accessible.
pricing.guaranteeTitle: Beta guarantee: today's price is your price forever
pricing.guaranteeDesc: Those who join during the Closed Beta (April‚ÄìJune 2026) lock the current price permanently. If you keep your subscription active, you'll never pay the 2027 standard rate. If you cancel and return, you re-enter at full price.
pricing.faq1q: When can I start using the app?
pricing.faq1a: Closed Beta opens April 2026 for the first 20‚Äì50 selected referrals. Apply now.
pricing.faq2q: Is the beta price really locked forever?
pricing.faq2a: Yes. As long as your subscription is active, the price doesn't change. The 2027 rate applies only to new subscribers.
pricing.faq3q: What happens if I stop paying and want to come back?
pricing.faq3a: You re-enter at the current price at the time of return, not the original beta price. Use subscription pause instead of cancellation.
pricing.faq4q: Is the Matching Wizard really anonymous?
pricing.faq4a: Yes. Answers are never transmitted to shelters. The shelter only sees the final compatibility score, not your personal lifestyle data.
pricing.faq5a: The free tier never expires. Use the free version with no time limits.
pricing.faq6q: Does the Shelter package include volunteers?
pricing.faq6a: Basic: 5 accounts. Pro: unlimited. Enterprise: multi-location + API.
pricing.ctaTitle: Join the Beta. Today's price is yours forever.
pricing.ctaNote: No credit card required to apply
pricing.adopterPremiumFeat10: Guided home verification with 'Verified Home' badge in applications
pricing.shelterVerifNote: View 'Verified Home' badge and safety report in applications (no access to original photos)
pricing.fosterVerifNote: Mandatory guided home verification ¬∑ verification stays saved in profile for future applications

roadmap.heroDesc: City Cat is in active development. This is the updated public roadmap. Closed Beta opens April 2026 for the first selected referrals.
roadmap.block0Feat2: Base user profiles with geographic zone
roadmap.block0Feat3: Explore map with cat and shelter pins
roadmap.block1Feat1: Complete cat profile with behavioral assessment
roadmap.block1Feat9: Guided home verification with camera (adoption + mandatory for foster)
roadmap.block2Feat1: Full task board with advanced swipe and completion form
roadmap.block2Feat6: Missing cats with real-time sighting map
roadmap.block5Feat2: Artisan shop with order management and commissions
roadmap.block5Feat4: Collection drives with live QR code
roadmap.block6Feat2: API data export for municipal systems
roadmap.changelogGithub: Full technical changelog on GitHub (team access)
roadmap.ctaTitle: Want to shape the roadmap? Join the Beta.
roadmap.ctaDesc: Beta testers have direct access to the team for feedback and feature requests.

tutorialEnte.pageDesc: From publishing a cat to managing applications and the RoutineLine. Estimated time: 8 minutes.
tutorialEnte.s1Title: Publish a cat with behavioral profile
tutorialEnte.s1Desc: Fill in the registry card. Required data: name, estimated birth date, sex, sterilization, microchip, at least 3 photos.
tutorialEnte.s1FIVBadge: FIV+ detected ‚Üí system will suggest Heart Adoption badge
tutorialEnte.s1HeartTrigger: The system detected 2 Heart Adoption triggers: FIV+ and age >8 years.
tutorialEnte.s2StoryText: He had been in the shelter for 3 years when our volunteer Marco met him‚Ä¶
tutorialEnte.s2PatienceText: Romeo needs time to trust. The first days he'll hide‚Ä¶
tutorialEnte.s2VictoriesText: When he arrived he wouldn't let anyone touch him. Now he accepts cuddles in the evening‚Ä¶
tutorialEnte.s2LookingFor: What they look for in an adopter
tutorialEnte.s2LookingForText: Someone with time, patience, preferably no small children.
tutorialEnte.s2Published: ‚úì Romeo is now visible in the app with the ‚ù§Ô∏è Heart Adoption badge. He appears in the dedicated section on all adopters' home in the area.
tutorialEnte.s3Desc: Each application shows the Reputational Score ‚Äî an objective history based on previous adoptions and verified profile.
tutorialEnte.s3ApprovedMsg: ‚úì Application approved. The RoutineLine activates automatically.
tutorialEnte.s3NotifMsg: Sara M. received a push notification: "Your application for Romeo has been approved. The adoption process starts now."
tutorialEnte.s4Desc: Each step unlocks only when the previous one is completed. Assign the vet visit to a volunteer.
tutorialEnte.s4Assigned: ‚úì Assigned to Sara B. ¬∑ Deadline: 7 days
tutorialEnte.s4NotifMsg: Sara B. received push notification with task details. She'll complete from her Task Board with left swipe, uploading the vet report photo.
tutorialEnte.s5Result: Romeo now appears in Matching Wizard results for compatible adopters. Premium adopters receive automatic alerts if their profile is ‚â•80% compatible.
tutorialEnte.s3VerifInfo: When an adopter applies with a 'Verified Home ‚úì' badge, you can view the safety report of their home in the application. You don't see the original photos ‚Äî only the list of confirmed elements and any open flags.

tutorialAdottante.pageDesc: From the Matching Wizard to the 5-step application. Estimated time: 6 minutes.
tutorialAdottante.s1Title: Find your cat with the Matching Wizard
tutorialAdottante.s1Desc: Answer 6 quick questions. Your answers are completely anonymous ‚Äî shelters never see them.
tutorialAdottante.s1Complete: ‚ú® Calculation complete! Press "Next" to see results.
tutorialAdottante.s2Desc: The system found compatible cats. Free tier shows top 3. With Premium: full list + alerts.
tutorialAdottante.s2R1: Used to being alone up to 8 hours
tutorialAdottante.s2PremiumHint: There are 12 more compatible cats. Unlock the full list with Premium ¬∑ ‚Ç¨29/year
tutorialAdottante.s3Desc: The profile shows registry data, health status and the behavioral profile that generated your score.
tutorialAdottante.s4Desc: The application is free for everyone. The wizard auto-saves every 30 seconds.
tutorialAdottante.s5Desc: Your application is under review. The shelter sees your Reputational Score and will decide. Push notification for every update.
tutorialAdottante.s5Result: When the shelter approves, the RoutineLine unlocks and you see the next steps. Your role: post-adoption checkups at 7 and 30 days with photos.
tutorialAdottante.s4VerifBlock: After the text data, the system offers the guided camera verification. Tap 'Start verification' for the 3-minute tour ‚Äî or 'Skip for now' to proceed without. Verification adds the 'Verified Home' badge to your application.
tutorialAdottante.s4VerifScoreBadge: Increases your reputational score in the application

tutorialVolontario.pageDesc: Task board, relays and foster management. Your work, organized. Estimated time: 5 minutes.
tutorialVolontario.s1Desc: Every task assigned by the shelter appears on your board with colored urgency. No WhatsApp messages ‚Äî everything is centralized.
tutorialVolontario.s1Instruction: üí° Instruction: Swipe left on "Pre-placement visit Luna" to complete it. Press "Next" to simulate completion.
tutorialVolontario.s2Desc: Completion requires a confirmation photo. The system records it with timestamp and attaches it to the RoutineLine.
tutorialVolontario.s2Notes: Visit completed. Report attached. Luna is in good health, ready for placement.
tutorialVolontario.s2Result: Luna's RoutineLine automatically advances to step 5. The shelter received notification: "Pre-placement visit Luna completed by Sara B. ‚Äî report available."
tutorialVolontario.s3Desc: Relays coordinate cat transport on assigned legs. Each leg requires photo check-in and signature check-out.
tutorialVolontario.s3Leg1Note: Check-in: photo required ¬∑ Check-out: receiver signature
tutorialVolontario.s3FutureDesc: When available: automatic geolocation check-in, digital signature check-out, real-time position update for the shelter.

homeVerif.mockInstruction: Frame the window and its lock
homeVerif.featureDesc: A 3-minute guided tour with your smartphone camera. The system guides you to photograph doors, windows, screens, balcony and outdoor space. No video is recorded and photos are never visible to shelters ‚Äî only the element confirmation report.
homeVerif.featureBullet1: Required for foster application ¬∑ optional (recommended) for adoption
homeVerif.featureBullet2: 'Verified Home' badge increases your reputational score in applications
homeVerif.featureBullet3: Generates automatic checklist of items to complete before adoption
homeVerif.featureBullet4: Verification stays saved in your profile and is reused in future applications
